verbs.description: it up to voters to [V: change] [ARG1: country] direction our country badly needs moral leaders who support american values we need people who respect the rule of law rather than undermining it and considering themselves above it we need leaders who respect women and minorities rather than demeaning them and making fun of them we need leaders who promote freedom of speech and the press not ones promoting conspiracies and denigrating the press we need leaders who will leave a habitable globe for our children and grandchildren rather than selfishly promoting current fossil fuel use we need leaders who realize that health care should be available to all of us americans not leaders planning to peel away safeguards for those with preexisting conditions for example we need leaders who support public education rather than enriching for - profit school owners we need leaders who recognize the value brought by new immigrants regardless of skin color or religion we need leaders who support everyday workers rather than the extreme wealthy and who give voice to the voiceless rather than the powerful we need leaders who recognize the importance of our allies rather than those whose reckless policies are leading to the laughter and derision of world leaders and the advancement of
